import React, { Component } from 'react' import TextBefore from './TextBefore'; class TextAfter extends Component { state={ text:' ', hed:13, fontSize:'', textColor:'', } hendelonChange=(event)=>{ this.setState({ [event.target.id]: event.target.value}); } hedOnclick=()=>{ if(this.state.hed==13){ this.setState({hed:22}) }else this.setState({hed:13}) } render() { console.log(this.state.hed) return (











) } } export default TextAfter
